body: Earlier I uploaded the uncensored version of this tank onto panda, this version is the censored one. Unfortunately nhentai only grabs stuff from panda without any context or changelog. If there was another upload on nhentai for this tank it was only because a chapter got decensored and I updated the gallery on panda. Nhentai just doesn't update their gallerys at all, instead they reupload the whole gallery. So, there was never a change in the translations, only chapters got decensored with every upload. Enjoy, I guess.

Why keep reuploading this?
If they keep modifying the translation that much why not wait for the final modification?
